data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Benetti, Cesar João, Hamada, Neusa (2017): Two new species of Haliplus Latreille, 1802 (Coleoptera, Haliplidae) from Northern Brazil. Zootaxa 4282 (3): 584-592, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4282.3.10|4 occurrences
